author: Louise Radnofsky
title: White House Steps Up Defense of Former VA Pick
text:
WASHINGTON—The White House escalated on Friday its defense of physician Ronny Jackson, who withdrew from consideration to lead the Department of Veterans Affairs, saying its own review of documents turned up no evidence to support two central allegations that doomed his candidacy.
Dr. Jackson had been accused of crashing a government car after drinking alcohol and of liberally dispensing prescription drugs, including opioid painkillers and sleep aids, according to a document released by the top Democrat on the Senate Veterans’...
